title.text: Security Update for Windows Vista x64-based Systems (KB938464)

description.text: A security issue has been identified that could allow an attacker to remotely compromise a Windows-based system that uses GDI+ and gain control over it. You can help protect your computer by installing this update from Microsoft.  After you install this item, you may have to restart your computer. This update is provided to you and licensed under the Windows Vista License Terms.
